portfolio.title: Wordle Clone
portfolio.description: Using easy concept of data attributes this project was executed i.e. a fully working WORDLE clone.

portfolio.title: Catto Card
portfolio.description: Introductory Exercise to learn ReactJs, used generic Images and name generating API to make this website.

portfolio.title: AdvGuild

portfolio.title: Netflix Clone
portfolio.description: Netflix Clone with NextJS framework. tmDB api was used to get the movie data and TailwindCSS was used for styling purpose with firebase as backend tool
portfolio.stack: React JS, Html, Css, FireBase, Next JS
